message: I'm looking for inspiration on how to simplify an admin-system at work in which we support adding content in several different languages (three for now, but it'll be more). Right now it's just three replicas of the inputs next to each other but that won't work much longer. Any ideas, inspiration, patterns, etc?
What's the use case? A person has text in three languages and needs to input all three at the same time? Or a person will want to input in one of the three language, but you don't know which one?

Left side: one version in language A in readonly. Right side, new version for language B. Can copy text from one language to another to kickstart the translation. Man, it is hard to describe what I mean, hopefully you understood something...
http://i.imgur.com/89xvv.png ← what my group came up with in a similar project
